# East Kalimantan as the New J-Town

In this application, you will be able to perform Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) and different clustering analysis. There is a Data tab for users to take a look at the actual data. 


## Application
You can view our Shiny application [here](https://erika-aldisa-gunawan.shinyapps.io/IS415_T14_EastKalimantan_New_JTown/)
